content.text:
# Jhalawar Medical College

| type                   = Government  Medical College
| principal              = Dr. Shiv Bhagwan Sharma
| location               = Nh 12, Kota Road, Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India
| affiliations           = Rajasthan University of Health Sciences
| city                   =
| website                = https://educationsector.rajasthan.gov.in/content/raj/education/jhalawar-hospital---medical-college--jhalawar/en/home.html#
}}
Jhalawar Medical College is a public  Medical College situated in the city Jhalawar, of the Indian state Rajasthan. The new Hospital and College started functioning from 27 March 2008. The first MBBS batch of 100 students was admitted in 2008 through RPMT & AIPMT. Since 2016, the college got permission from NMC for 150 students per year. From 2019, college admits 200 students per year.
Jhalawar Medical College also have PG course in various departments.
